wms_article.title: Hancom With posts record half-year earnings on gold boom

wms_article_body.body: Hancom With, Hancom Group’s de facto holding company, announced on Monday that it recorded 346.6 billion won ($255 million) in consolidated revenue and 2.5 billion won in operating profit in the first half of 2025. The results represent year-on-year increases of 64.6 percent in revenue and 749.9 percent in operating profit, marking the company’s best-ever half-year performance. The company said that soaring gold prices fueled rapid growth at its affiliate Hancom Gold Exchange, which significantly contributed to the strong results. Hancom With said it will step up efforts to expand its real asset-linked business in the second half of the year as well as accelerating the commercialization of next-generation security technologies such as quantum cryptography.
